Name: Iron Broadsword
WeaponDescription: A standard iron broadsword sharp enough for adventuring.

Name: Charred Staff
SkillDescription: Send out a fireball dealing amplified damage.
WeaponDescription: An oak wood staff a little charred from magic practice.

Name: Legendary Sword
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy with the power of the heavens. Ignores defense.
WeaponDescritpion: A legendary sword from the ancient times. Infused with the power of the heavens.

Name: Featherblessed Blade
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy twice in quick succession.
WeaponDescription: A simple longsword enchanted with magical lightness.

Name: Venomspike Maw
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy with venomous barbs. Does increased damage to enemies with HP greater than yours.
WeaponDescription: A powerful club barbed with the poisonous teeth of a defeated Titan Devourer.

Name: Molten Marrowsplitter
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy with a slash hotter than a million suns. Kills any enemy with 20% or less HP
WeaponDescription: A polished obsidian blade with fiery veins that flow through it. The warmth of power and terror radiate from it.

Name: The Smokesword
SkillDescription: Creates an obscuring cloud of smoke that reduces the enemy's accuracy.
WeaponDescription: A blade that is constantly coated in a hazardous black smoke. Enemies who breath the smoke seem to miss their attacks constantly.

Name: Weapon@5d099f62
SkillDescription: Glitch out the enemy, or maybe yourself

Name: Cursed Bramble
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy, bypassing some defense.
WeaponDescription: A bramble that seems to exude an aura of evil.
